message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for both of us to make a great deal. I'm willing to offer you the product for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $925000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me try one last time. I propose an offer of $875000. This still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value of the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $875000. I'm willing to make a slight concession and offer the product for $950000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
I understand your stance, Alice. My final offer is $900000. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.
